text: My mom was amazing. She believed in me and we were best friends.
author: Carmen Electra

text: My mom was a seamstress, and I wish I'd learned to sew because I'm obsessed with 'Project Runway!'
author: Carmen Electra

text: If I have any talent at all it's from God, and my mom, who was on Capitol Records also.
author: Garth Brooks

text: My mom and dad got divorced when I was very young, and growing up in a family where the head of the household wasn't a man made a big difference.
author: Dave Mustaine

text: I want to be a fun mom. Not a gasping for air mom.
author: Mariska Hargitay
